definitions.definition: One who is stooped or hunched over.
A deformed upper spinal column in the shape of a hump in the back.
A person with kyphosis , a spinal deformity that causes a hunched over appearance.

main_definition: One who is stooped or hunched over.
secondary_definitions: A deformed upper spinal column in the shape of a hump in the back.
( derogatory ) A person with kyphosis , a spinal deformity that causes a hunched over appearance.
